mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
mailBody:
Dear Shubham,

I hope this message finds you well.

I wanted to inform you that I have successfully updated the checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC using the internal data you provided. The updated checklist is now ready for your review. 

### Updated Checklist Table

| Checklist Item                        | Status      | Comment                                                                                                         | Source                        |
|---------------------------------------|-------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------|
| Company Address Proof                 | Validated   | Address proof is available with utility bill issued by London City Utilities.                                  | DIM_CompanyAddressProof       |
| Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey | Validated   | Annual accounts and Ellipro scores for 2020–2022 are available.                                                | DIM_CompanyAnnualAccountsAndElliproSurvey |
| Company Bank and Postal Details       | Validated   | Bank and postal details are verified with available bank account and SWIFT code.                               | DIM_CompanyBankAndPostalDetails |
| Company Directorship                  | Pending     | Directorship data found but pending verification for some directors.                                           | DIM_CompanyDirectorship       |
| Company Tax Documentation             | Pending     | Tax documentation available but pending additional information and reviews for some records.                   | DIM_CompanyTaxDocuments       |
| Company Regulatory Compliance         | Pending     | Regulatory compliance data available but under review for some compliance types.                               | DIM_CompanyRegulatory         |
| Company Business Scope                | Pending     | Detailed business scope information available but verification status is pending.                              | DIM_CompanyBusinessScope      |
| Company PEP Screening                 | Validated   | PEP screening data is available from the internal attachment provided.                                         | Internal Attachment           |
| Company Revenue Details               | Validated   | Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars for the year ended December 31, 2023 is reported.                   | Annual Report                 |
| Company Market Capitalization Details | Validated   | Market capitalization as of December 31, 2023 is reported as 489,320 million dollars.                         | Annual Report                 |

The JSON file containing the detailed checklist has been securely stored for your reference.

If you have any further questions or need additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Surbhi Nagori
surbhi.nagori@capgemini.com
